channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Multisite Content Copier/Updater
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Multisite Content Copier/Updater

item.title: CVE-2021-25039|2024-08-03T19:49:14.586Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20multisite%20content%20copier%2Fupdater
item.description: The WordPress Multisite Content Copier/Updater WordPress plugin before 2.1.0 does not sanitise and escape the wmcc_content_type, wmcc_source_blog and wmcc_record_per_page parameters before outputting them back in attributes, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issues
